attributes.additional_details:
Stories such as the Leveson Inquiry and Kate Middleton’ s topless pictures have been questioned by the public, because the press are getting free handed with their right of freedom of speech. News paper articles such as these are a concern to us, because the press are gathering primary or secondary information that should not be published for any reason without the information owner’s acceptance of publishing.There are arguments against our campaigns, which is inevitable to happen to any campaign.

If you are supporting this campaign please sign this E- Petition.

Thank you
